creator: michael@wohlfart.net
text:
In the default Publication after saving a Document in BXE the 
login screen pops up, seems like there is a missing entry in 
usecase-policies.xml (close.bxe)

creator: michael@wohlfart.net
text:
Created attachment 18753
patch usecase-policies for default publication

missing entry in usecase-policies

creator: dhc4z@virginia.edu
text: thanks for the patch! Should be able to close bxe once again
